mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM KT.GV_EMPLOYEE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT AUTH FROM KT.GV_EMPLOYEE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT COM_ID FROM KT.GV_COMPANY_JOB_TIT WHERE JOB_TIT_ID = #{jobTitId}
SELECT COM_ID FROM KT.GV_COMPANY_TEAM WHERE TEAM_ID = #{team_id}
SELECT COUnT(*) FROM KT.GV_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM KT.GV_NTCN_SETUP WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM KT.GV_SPECIALTY WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM KT.GV_COM_HASHTAG WHERE COM_ID = #{comId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM KT.GV_COMPANY_TEAM WHERE TEAM = #{team} AND COM_ID = #{comId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM KT.GV_COMPANY_JOB_TIT WHERE JOB_TIT = #{jobTit} AND COM_ID = #{comId}
SELECT JOB_TIT_ID FROM KT.GV_COMPANY_JOB_TIT WHERE JOB_TIT = #{jobTit} AND COM_ID = #{comId}

SELECT GU.PF_ON_OFF , CAST(AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(GU.NM),SHA2('a1s2d3f4g5h6j7k8l9!',512)) AS CHAR) AS NM , GC.COM_NM , GCT.TEAM , GCJT.JOB_TIT , IFNULL(GU.INTRO,'') AS INTRO , IFNULL(GU.PHONE_NUM, '') AS PHONE_NUM , CAST(AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(GU.MAIL),SHA2('a1s2d3f4g5h6j7k8l9!',512)) AS CHAR) AS MAIL , GE.AUTH FROM GV_EMPLOYEE GE LEFT JOIN GV_USER GU on GE.USER_ID = GU.USER_ID LEFT JOIN GV_COMPANY GC on GE.COM_ID = GC.COM_ID LEFT JOIN GV_COMPANY_TEAM GCT on GE.TEAM_ID = GCT.TEAM_ID LEFT JOIN GV_COMPANY_JOB_TIT GCJT on GE.JOB_TIT = GCJT.JOB_TIT_ID WHERE GE.USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT SALT FROM KT.GV_USER WHERE 1 = 1 AND USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT NTCN_PREVIEW_YN , NTCN_SOUND_YN , FAV_COM_NTCN_YN , CALL_POPUP_YN , SCHDL_NTCN_YN , MTG_POPUP_NTCN_YN , EVENT_NTCN_YN FROM KT.GV_NTCN_SETUP WHERE 1 = 1 AND USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT THEME FROM KT.GV_NTCN_SETUP WHERE 1 = 1 AND USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT USER_ID , SEQ , COM_NM , COM_ID , FAV_COM_ON_OFF , FAV_COM_EVEN_ON_OFF FROM KT.GV_FAV WHERE 1 = 1 AND USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT TEAM , TEAM_ID , COM_ID FROM KT.GV_COMPANY_TEAM WHERE 1 = 1 AND COM_ID = (SELECT COM_ID FROM KT.GV_EMPLOYEE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})
SELECT JOB_TIT , JOB_TIT_ID , COM_ID FROM KT.GV_COMPANY_JOB_TIT WHERE 1 = 1 AND COM_ID = (SELECT COM_ID FROM KT.GV_EMPLOYEE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})

SELECT CAST(AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(GU.nm),SHA2('a1s2d3f4g5h6j7k8l9!',512)) AS CHAR) AS NM ,CAST(AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(GU.mail),SHA2('a1s2d3f4g5h6j7k8l9!',512)) AS CHAR) AS MAIL , GC.COM_NM , GCT.TEAM , GCJT.JOB_TIT , GU.INTRO , GU.PHONE_NUM , GNS.NTCN_PREVIEW_YN FROM KT.GV_EMPLOYEE GE LEFT JOIN GV_USER GU on GE.USER_ID = GU.USER_ID LEFT JOIN GV_COMPANY GC on GE.COM_ID = GC.COM_ID LEFT JOIN GV_COMPANY_TEAM GCT on GE.TEAM_ID = GCT.TEAM_ID LEFT JOIN GV_COMPANY_JOB_TIT GCJT on GE.JOB_TIT = GCJT.JOB_TIT LEFT JOIN GV_NTCN_SETUP GNS on GE.USER_ID = GNS.USER_ID WHERE GE.USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT SPECIALTY FROM KT.GV_SPECIALTY WHERE SPECIALTY LIKE CONCAT(#{word},'%') GROUP BY SPECIALTY
SELECT COM_HASHTAG FROM KT.GV_COM_HASHTAG WHERE COM_HASHTAG LIKE CONCAT(#{word},'%') GROUP BY COM_HASHTAG
SELECT COM_NM , META_WEB_URL , COM_TYPE , COM_UK , BULD_TEMP ,BULD_COL_TEMP , OFFICE_TEMP FROM KT.GV_COMPANY WHERE COM_ID = ( SELECT COM_ID FROM KT.GV_EMPLOYEE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} )
SELECT COM_INTRO , COM_ADD , COM_NUM1 , COM_NUM2 FROM GV_COMPANY WHERE COM_ID = ( SELECT COM_ID FROM KT.GV_EMPLOYEE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} )
SELECT COM_ID , BSNS_FIELD_ID , BSNS_FIELD FROM KT.GV_COMPANY_BSNS_FIELD WHERE COM_ID = ( SELECT COM_ID FROM KT.GV_EMPLOYEE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} )
SELECT BSNS_FIELD_ID , BSNS_FIELD FROM KT.GV_COMPANY_BSNS_FIELD_FORM
SELECT UTZTN_TECH_ID , UTZTN_TECH , COM_ID FROM KT.GV_COMPANY_UTZTN_TECH WHERE COM_ID = ( SELECT COM_ID FROM KT.GV_EMPLOYEE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} )
SELECT UTZTN_TECH_ID , UTZTN_TECH FROM KT.GV_COMPANY_UTZTN_TECH_FORM
SELECT INVEST_STAGE ,INVEST_STAGE_ID , COM_ID FROM KT.GV_COMPANY_INVEST_STAGE WHERE COM_ID = ( SELECT COM_ID FROM KT.GV_EMPLOYEE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} )
SELECT INVEST_STAGE ,INVEST_STAGE_ID FROM KT.GV_COMPANY_INVEST_STAGE_FORM;
SELECT COM_ID , COM_HASHTAG FROM KT.GV_COM_HASHTAG WHERE COM_ID = ( SELECT COM_ID FROM KT.GV_EMPLOYEE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} )
SELECT COM_ID , MGT_SUP FROM KT.GV_COM_MGT_SUP WHERE COM_ID = ( SELECT COM_ID FROM KT.GV_EMPLOYEE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} )
SELECT USER_ID FROM KT.GV_FAV WHERE SEQ = #{seq}

SELECT CAST(AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(GU.nm),SHA2('a1s2d3f4g5h6j7k8l9!',512)) AS CHAR) AS NM ,CAST(AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(GU.mail),SHA2('a1s2d3f4g5h6j7k8l9!',512)) AS CHAR) AS MAIL , GCT.TEAM , GCJT.JOB_TIT , GE.AUTH , GE.AUTH_TYPE , GE.STTUS FROM KT.GV_EMPLOYEE GE LEFT JOIN GV_USER GU on GE.USER_ID = GU.USER_ID LEFT JOIN GV_COMPANY_TEAM GCT on GE.TEAM_ID = GCT.TEAM_ID LEFT JOIN GV_COMPANY_JOB_TIT GCJT on GE.JOB_TIT = GCJT.JOB_TIT_ID WHERE GE.COM_ID = ( SELECT GE2.COM_ID FROM KT.GV_EMPLOYEE GE2 WHERE GE2.USER_ID = #{userId} )
SELECT USER_ID FROM KT.GV_USER WHERE MAIL = #{encMail}

SELECT CAST(AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(GU.nm),SHA2('a1s2d3f4g5h6j7k8l9!',512)) AS CHAR) AS NM ,CAST(AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(GU.mail),SHA2('a1s2d3f4g5h6j7k8l9!',512)) AS CHAR) AS MAIL FROM KT.GV_USER GU WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE KT.GV_EMPLOYEE SET STTUS = '초대요청' WHERE 1 = 1 AND USER_ID = #{userId}
UPDATE KT.GV_EMPLOYEE SET STTUS = '초대완료' WHERE 1 = 1 AND USER_ID = #{userId}
